bioghist.p: Lloyd C. Minter lived in Germantown, Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of genealogical research and family papers related to various members of the Minter and allied families. Materials include: correspondence from family members in Australia, England, North Ireland, and the United States on personal and genealogical topics; family charts and datasheets; notes on various family members, some taken from published and archival sources going back to the 18th century; newspaper clippings; greeting cards and wedding invitations; personal records and memorabilia such as baptism certificates, applications for membership in patriotic societies, and children's drawings; and many photographs, a number from the 19th century. There are also some mass-produced family heritage books.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
